Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.yash.MovieBooking.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for managing user related requests, including registration, authentication, and user data retrieval.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/home/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Movie>> home(@PathVariable int userId)
      Retrieves a list of movies for the home page.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of Movie objects.

    • register

      @PostMapping("/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> register(@RequestBody UserDTO userDTO)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - The UserDTO containing the user's registration information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created UserDTO.

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> logout()
      Logs out the current user. Handled by Spring Security.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a confirmation message.

    • getAdminDashboard

      @GetMapping("/admin/dashboard") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAdminDashboard(Principal principal)
      Retrieves admin dashboard data, including total bookings and price. Requires the user to be authenticated as an admin.
      Parameters:
      principal - The currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a map with admin dashboard information.

    • getCurrentUser

      @GetMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getCurrentUser(Principal principal)
      Retrieves the details of the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      principal - The currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the UserDTO of the current user.

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users. Accessible only by administrators.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of UserDTOs.

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a specific user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the UserDTO if found, or NOT_FOUND if not.
